channel.title: Alright my forums
channel.description:
Ok on my forums I have it setup smf and all but... when I go them it says
Connection Problems Sorry, SMF was unable to connect to the database. This may be caused by the server being busy. Please try again later.
and when i go to the website it works SO THE HOST IS NOT DOWN
now how do i figure out if im being attacked?
THANKS 8 VIEWS 0 HELPERs u all suck! PLEASE HELPME
